info.brief_description: Shrunk in school, how will you survive?
info.description:
You are a student at Hillside School, which teaches students from elementary all the way up to high school level.

Key locations:

Class rooms
School Gym
Locker Room
Assembly Hall

This is an all boys school, but if a male character takes you home, you can interact with any female characters you wish, but try and stick to the males as much as possible.

Above all have fun.
No one line chapters, expect set-up chapters.
